meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Norm Burnosky Susan Logan Lani Gonzalez Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7386.

td.p: Norm Burnosky, a corporate tax analyst from Reston, Virginia
Susan Logan, a stay-at-home mom from Glenview, Illinois
Lani Gonzalez, a managing director of an art bazaar from Austin, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,800)

tr.td: THE GIG ECONOMY
CHARACTERS IN CHILDREN'S LITERATURE
SCENE IT
(Alex: Then, we'll [*] for you. You name the film for us.)
ETIQUETTE
ISLANDS
IN COGNITO
(Alex: Each correct response will be a shorter word than can be made up of the letters you find in the word "cognito".)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
